ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND(ISPICKVAL( Question_Type__c , 'Picklist'), !ISNULL( OptionValueSet__c)), AND(ISPICKVAL( Question_Type__c , 'Picklist (Multi-Select)'), !ISNULL( OptionValueSet__c)),AND(ISPICKVAL( Question_Type__c , 'Radio'), !ISNULL( OptionValueSet__c)),AND(ISPICKVAL( Question_Type__c , 'Checkbox'), !ISNULL( OptionValueSet__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Plese fill the options value set
